metadata.name: Syringes+
metadata.description:
The Syringes+ Mod adds a variety of different Syringe based items to the item pool. Future updates will add more items, pills, and a new character.
Current Item List:
Passives: - Used Needle (Reduces Fire Delay) - Morphine (Reduces Speed, Gives 2 Spirit Hearts) - Booster Shot (Increases Speed, Increases Damage) - Allergy Shot (Increases Shot Speed, Reduces Fire Delay) - Lucky Juice (Increases Luck) - Lethal Injection (Increases Damage, Reduces Fire Delay, Makes Tears Red)
Actives: - Little Helper (Random Stat Increase For One Room)
Pills: - Sleeping Pill (Adds a SpiritHeart) - I've Been Bad (Adds a Black Heart)
